projects.title: AI-Powered Personal Assistant
projects.description: Develop an AI-powered personal assistant that integrates natural language processing (NLP) and speech recognition to perform tasks such as scheduling, reminders, and information retrieval. Enhance it with a web interface for task management and voice command capabilities.
features: Speech Recognition: Convert spoken language into text commands using tools like Google Speech-to-Text or Whisper.
Task Scheduling: Set reminders, create events, and notify users via push notifications or emails.
Web Dashboard: A React/Next.js-based interface for viewing and managing tasks.
API Integration: Fetch real-time data like weather, news, or stock prices using external APIs.

projects.title: Secure E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Create a full-stack secure e-commerce platform with modern design, payment gateway integration, and robust authentication. Focus on user experience and cybersecurity best practices.
features: User Authentication: Role-based access control with password hashing and 2FA.
Product Management: Admin panel for adding, updating, and deleting products.
Payment Integration: Stripe or PayPal for secure transactions.
Real-Time Analytics: Track user activity, sales, and inventory.
Secure Development: Implement OWASP guidelines to prevent vulnerabilities.

projects.title: Mobile Health Tracker
projects.description: Develop a cross-platform mobile application to help users track health metrics like steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns. Integrate with wearable devices and provide actionable insights.
features: Data Sync: Connect with devices via Bluetooth or APIs.
User Dashboard: Display metrics and trends over time using charts.
Health Tips: AI-powered suggestions for improving health based on user data.
Push Notifications: Reminders for hydration, exercise, and medication.

technologies.deployment: Google Play Store and Apple App Store

projects.title: Cybersecurity Vulnerability Scanner
projects.description: Build a tool to identify security vulnerabilities in web applications by scanning for common issues such as SQL injection, XSS, and insecure headers. Provide a detailed report and mitigation suggestions.
features: Scanning Capabilities: Detect OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities.
Custom Rules: Allow users to define scanning rules for specific requirements.
Report Generation: Provide detailed PDF reports with findings and recommendations.
Dashboard: Web interface for scan management and results visualization.

technologies.securityTools: OWASP ZAP API, custom Python scripts
